duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage scheduling, email responses, and administrative tasks on behalf of the executive.
Deal with insurance applications, processing, and detail-oriented work with a high level of responsibility.
Manage and coordinate various business ventures, including insurance, tattoo bookings, and yacht charter sales.
Lead office management and supervise a team, providing support as the right hand to the owner.
Assist in the success and efficiency of business operations and time management for the owner.
Respond to emails and document requests on behalf of the owner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
